attributes.action: Revoke the Rt Hon title for all Members of Parliament until their behaviour relating to expense claims warrants it's re-instatement
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a result of the failure of the expenses process to effectively shepherd MP's moral compasses this petition aims to provide a pathway for MP's to earn back the title Rt Hon which for centuries has been a given. The discreditation of the title ignobles the position of MP's in constitutional terms and must be revoked until such time MP's are able to demonstrate probity and moral leadership expected from their position.

rejection.details: This is a matter for Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
